snippet: The relationship of Flavia Wasescha, a job-seeker, and Venus Clemons, looking for domestic help, began with an Internet want ad and ended unsatisfactorily.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes routine known as the 'nanny scam,' in which perpetrators, posing as potential employers, prey financially upon young women seeking work as nannies.
lead_paragraph: The relationship of Flavia Wasescha, a job-seeker, and Venus Clemons, looking for domestic help, began with an Internet want ad and ended unsatisfactorily.

headline.main: The Willing Nanny, the Happy Family: Too Good to Be True
headline.print_headline: The Willing Nanny, the Happy Family: Too Good to Be True
